verses.name: Genesis 7:15
verses.text: And they went in unto Noah into the ark, two and two of all flesh, wherein is the breath of life.

verses.name: Genesis 7:16
verses.text: And they that went in, went in male and female of all flesh, as God had commanded him: and the Lord shut him in.

verses.name: Genesis 7:17
verses.text: And the flood was forty days upon the earth; and the waters increased, and bare up the ark, and it was lift up above the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 7:18
verses.text: And the waters prevailed, and were increased greatly upon the earth; and the ark went upon the face of the waters.
